tweet:

image_prompt: [Cozy 8-bit pixel art RPG inventory screen]. A pixelated bee character discovering glowing legendary loot items: a retro video tape (Grok), a golden paintbrush (Flux), and a speech bubble (ElevenLabs). Soft lime green (#ecf874) glow effects against a dark purple background. High contrast, 'achievement unlocked' energy. Retro gaming UI with chunky text. Warm, exciting atmosphere.
reasoning: High-signal tweet listing the specific, high-demand models developers actually care about. The list format works well on X to stop the scroll. Reinforces 'shipping' culture.
